column5: I know it sucks outside but I did see a true sign of spring today. Hunkered down outside my window in oakville was a flock of about 100 swallows! They didnt look to impressed. If they can hang into friday and some warmer temps they should be ok. Not alot of calories in snow flakes.
It should be about spring weather at the end of this week!
well hopefully your right and the weather goes uphill from then on in.... been getting skunked for long enuff!!! lol
I agree bucktail ... it sucks outside.    30+ mph wind gusts, blowing snow flurries, maybe 40F.    One of these days Spring will come and stick around until summer.   This is crazy weather.
